node_ip.Description: The IP Address of a Node in the Rubrik cluster.

password.Description: The password used to authenticate against the Rubrik cluster.

username.Description: The username used to authenticate against the Rubrik cluster.

object_name.Description: The name of the Rubrik object you wish to assign to an SLA Domain.

object_type.Description: The Rubrik object type you want to assign to the SLA Domain.

sla_name.Description: The name of the SLA Domain you wish to assign an object to. To exclude the object from all SLA assignments use `do not protect` as the `sla_name`. To assign the selected object to the SLA of the next higher level object use `clear` as the `sla_name`.

timeout.Description: The number of seconds to wait to establish a connection the Rubrik cluster before returning a timeout error.
